description: Set yourself up to explore winter. The X5 touring boot offers support, stability and control for on- and off-trail skiing. Designed for adventurous recreational skiers, the boot's tall cuff and lace cover seal out snow, while the thermo-moldable fit allows for customized comfort. A powerstrap complements the hinged cuff design for stability and range of motion, for a natural stride no matter where the snow takes you.<br><br>Ski Control, Walkability<br>The Sport Sole features Tech Grip for comfortable walking and central insert cleats for maximum precision and control on the ski<br><br>Customizable Fit, Comfort<br>Thermoadjustable liners can be heat-molded around your feet for a customized fit and comfort
name: XC 5 FW Touring Boots - Mens
